name: Billionaires Pixel Club
additional_notices:
The following token has a variable tax function on the smart contract to change tax rates post deployment.
Do your own research and be careful if you are trading this token.

description.en:
BILLIONAIRE PIXEL CLUB [BPC] is the Project Token from one BillionairePixelClub Project
1.000 x 1.000 Pixel = 1.000.000 Pixel total number BPC TOKEN = 1.000.000.000 BPC
The more pixels are paid with BPC, the higher the value of the project token increases.
This incentive not only creates a higher reach for the NFT project but also an increase in the overall Attractiveness of the token currency.
The marketing function is also supported by the continuous increase in value of the project token another advantage achieved for the NFT project.
